config.@wgCreateWikiCategories: Array. An array of categories used for wiki categorisaion.
config.@wgCreateWikiCustomDomainPage: String. Page name to link to for more information on custom domains.
config.@wgCreateWikiDatabase: String. Database name of where cw_wikis is stored.
config.@wgCreateWikiEmailNotifications: Boolean. Whether to send emails for new wiki creations.
config.@wgCreateWikiSQLfiles: Array. All SQLs to be loaded into every wiki by default.
config.@wgCreateWikiUseCategories: Boolean. Whether to use categories to categorise wikis.
config.@wgCreateWikiUseClosedWikis: Boolean. Whether to implement front end logic for closing wikis.
config.@wgCreateWikiUseCustomDomains: Boolean. Whether to implement front end logic to handle requesting custom domains for wikis in RequestWiki.
config.@wgCreateWikiUsePrivateWikis: Boolean. Whether to implement front end logic for marking wikis as private.
